def Load(widget): if widget.Entity == None or widget.Entity.AditivoHandle == None: widget.Hidden = True return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper
podeInserir = AuthorizationHelper.PodeInserirEntidade(widget.View.EntityDefinition.Name) aditivo = widget.Entity.AditivoInstance
podeAlterar = aditivo.PermiteAlterarAssinantesAditivo
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeAlterar and podeInserir widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
